Title: AN ACT APPROPRIATING THE SUM OF FIVE HUNDRED AND TWENTY-SIGHT DOLLARS AND NINETY CENTS, IN MONEY OF THE UNITED STATES, FOR THE PAYMENT OF THE SALARY OF ONE DRAFTSMAN, CLASS EIGHT, IN THE BUREAU OF PUBLIC LANDS, FOR FOUR MONTHS AND SIXTEEN DAYS OF THE FIRST HALF OF THE FISCAL YEAR NINETEEN HUNDRED AND FOUR.
Data:
[ Act No. 870, September 05, 1903 ]
AN ACT APPROPRIATING THE SUM OF FIVE HUNDRED AND TWENTY-SIGHT DOLLARS AND NINETY CENTS, IN MONEY OF THE UNITED STATES, FOR THE PAYMENT OF THE SALARY OF ONE DRAFTSMAN, CLASS EIGHT, IN THE BUREAU OF PUBLIC LANDS, FOR FOUR MONTHS AND SIXTEEN DAYS OF THE FIRST HALF OF THE FISCAL YEAR NINETEEN HUNDRED AND FOUR.
By authority of the United States, be it enacted by the Philippine Commission, that:
Section 1.1a—àphi1 There is hereby appropriated, out of any funds in the Insular Treasury not otherwise appropriated, the sum of five hundred and twenty-eight dollars and ninety cents, in money of the United States, for the payment of the salary of one draftsman, class eight, employed in the Bureau of Public Lands, as authorized by Act Numbered Eight hundred and seven, dated July twenty-seventh, nineteen hundred and three.
Section 2. The public good requiring the speedy enactment of this bill, the passage of the same is hereby expedited in accordance with section two of "An Act prescribing the order of procedure by the Commission in the enactment of laws," passed September twenty-sixth, nineteen hundred.
Section 3. This Act shall take effect on its passage.
Enacted, September 5, 1903.
